citeinfo.origin: Alberta Environment and Parks, Government of Alberta
citeinfo.title: Hydrologic Unit Code Watersheds of Alberta Index

descript.abstract:
This dataset is produced for the Government of Alberta and is available to the general public. Please consult the Distribution Information of this metadata for the appropriate contact to acquire this dataset.
This index dataset is intended to illustrate the extents of the Hydrologic Unit Code Watersheds levels 2 through 8. For detailed information about the individual Hydrologic Unit Code Watershed data sets, please refer to the individual metadata records for each dataset.
descript.purpose: To depict the extent of the current coverage of Hydrologic Unit Code watersheds within Alberta at the regional and provincial scales.

idinfo.accconst: To access the data you must agree to the terms of the Non-Commercial Licence – Alberta.
idinfo.useconst: Distribution Liability: The Information is licensed “as is”, and the Information Provider excludes all representations, warranties, obligations, and liabilities, whether express or implied, to the maximum extent permitted by law. The Information Provider is not liable for any errors or omissions in the Information, and will not under any circumstances be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, consequential, or other loss, injury or damage caused by its use or otherwise arising in connection with this licence or the Information, even if specifically advised of the possibility of such loss, injury or damage.

cntinfo.cntpos: Provincial Programs Delivery Branch, Operations Division
cntinfo.cntinst: This is the point of contact regarding the creation of, and characteristics of the data set. Queries about the creation of the dataset submitted through facsimile or electronic mail must include the salutation "Attention: Chad Sherburne, Provincial Programs Delivery Branch, Operations Division; Dataset: "Hydrologic Unit Code Watersheds of Alberta Index". For Distribution Information contact instructions, refer to the Distribution Information section of this metadata record. For Metadata Information contact instructions, refer to the Metadata Reference Information section of this metadata record.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3176

citeinfo.origin: Alberta Environment and Parks, Government of Alberta
citeinfo.title: Hydrologic Unit Code Watersheds of Alberta
citeinfo.othercit: There are 6 feature classes within the Hydrologic Unit Code Watersheds of Alberta feature dataset: HUC 2, HUC 4, HUC 6, HUC 8 and HUC 10 (coarsest to finest) plus the Pour Points

citeinfo.origin: Alberta Environment and Parks, Government of Alberta
citeinfo.title: Watersheds of Alberta (GOA)

pubinfo.publish: Alberta Environment and Parks, Government of Alberta

citeinfo.othercit: Previous versions of this data set have been made available as "Watersheds of Alberta 2011", "Watersheds of Alberta", and "Drainage Basins of Alberta". All of these former data sets are no longer valid and have been superseded by Watersheds of Alberta (GOA).

dataqual.logic: The HUC watersheds index feature class is complete for extent of the existing data.
dataqual.complete: This dataset is complete for all feature classes for the province of Alberta. No delineation coarser than HUC level 2 or finer than HUC level 8 is publically available.

distinfo.distliab: The user agrees that the information and each part thereof, any formatting or presentation thereof, any storage media on which it is provided, and any communication of any kind, incidental or in relation thereto, is provided to the user by the Minister and the Crown without warranty or representation as to any matter including but not limited to whether the information and storage media is correct, accurate or free from error, defect, danger, or hazard, and whether it is otherwise useful or suitable for any use the user may make of it. The Crown in right of Alberta, the Minister and her employees and agents, shall not be liable for any claims, costs, losses, or damages, including any special, indirect, incidental or consequential loss or damage, which the user may incur or experience as a result of the use or possession of the information or associated storage media.

digtinfo.filedec: File compression technology shall be utilized when required.

onlinopt.accinstr: FTP (File Transfer Protocol) is available, with the exception of data exceeding reasonable size limits or when corporate restrictions have been implemented in which the data will be delivered using alternative methods. Instructions on how to download data placed on our FTP site will be communicated when the data is ready for delivery.

stdorder.ordering: All requests for data / information are accepted via email, FAX, or Canada Post. All requests must include: Government of Alberta Ministry Name / Business Area Name, Physical Address, Contact Person Name(s), Phone and FAX Numbers, email Address, list of products requested, the geographic extent of the request (where product options are available - expressed by NTS block(s), township(s), etc), the delivery option required ( on-line / offline ), the data format when multiple formats are offered, and the intended use of the data.
stdorder.turnarnd: Requests for information are processed and completed in order of receipt with the exception of Alberta Environment and Parks requests that are authorized as priority status. All requests for information are completed with five (5) working days of receiving the request wherever possible.

digtinfo.filedec: File compression technology shall be utilized when required.

Instructions on how to download data placed on our FTP site will be communicated when the data is ready for delivery.

distinfo.techpreq: To utilize digital information, specialized graphics or GIS software (i.e. ArcInfo, ArcView, ArcGIS, or MicroStation) may be required.
distinfo.custom: Limited custom order processing of Informatics Branch information may be available to Alberta Environment and Parks personnel and contractors working on behalf of the Ministry.
